data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during El Magallanes cruise from La Habana to La Coruña started at 1767-12-12
Ship: El Magallanes (Paquebote), Voyage: La Habana - La Coruña, 1st Observer: Capitan
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
